name: Civilian
uniques: This Unit gains the [Immunity] promotion <with [10]% chance> <after discovering [Biology]>
This Unit gains the [Immunity] promotion <upon turn end> <with [1]% chance> <after discovering [Biology]>
This Unit gains the [Endotoxic Bacteria Infection] promotion <upon turn end> <when adjacent to a [Endotoxic Bacteria Infected] unit> <with [50]% chance> <for units without [Immunity]>
This Unit gains the [Verotoxic Bacteria Infection] promotion <upon turn end> <when adjacent to a [Verotoxic Bacteria Infected] unit> <with [50]% chance> <for units without [Immunity]>
This Unit loses the [Immunity] promotion <upon losing at least [1] HP in a single attack>　<vs [Super Antigen] units> <for units with [Immunity]>
This Unit gains the [Paralysis] promotion <upon losing at least [1] HP in a single attack>　<vs [Exotoxin] units> <for units without [Immunity]>
This Unit loses the [Verotoxic Bacteria Infection] promotion <upon losing at least [1] HP in a single attack>　<vs [Verotoxin] units> <for units with [Immunity]>
This Unit gains the [Endotoxic Bacteria Infection] promotion <upon losing at least [1] HP in a single attack>　<vs [Endotoxin] units> <for units without [Immunity]>
